Why <S%G1302><s%> do thy <S%G4675><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> <S%G5731><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5725><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G1302><s%> do ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5720><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, He that curseht <S%G2551><s%> <S%G5723><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, let him die <S%G5053><s%> <S%G5720><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%>, It is a gift <S%G1435><s%>, by <S%G1537><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest be profited <S%G5623><s%> <S%G5686><s%> by me <S%G1700><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5661><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, he shall be free. Thus <S%G2532><s%> have ye made <S%G208><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of none effect <S%G208><s%> <S%G5656><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>.
Ye hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>, well <S%G2573><s%> did <S%G4395><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>,

This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> draweth nigh <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> with their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> honoureth <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with their lips <S%G5491><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> <S%G5719><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> they do worship <S%G4576><s%> <S%G5736><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the Mitzvot <S%G1778><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> <S%G5666><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> <S%G5720><s%>:

Not <S%G3756><s%> that which goeth <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5740><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that which cometh <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5740><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%>, this <S%G5124><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5631><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Knowest thou <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> were offended <S%G4624><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, after they heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> this saying <S%G3056><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Havahry <S%G3956><s%> plant <S%G5451><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath <S%G5452><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, shall be rooted up <S%G1610><s%> <S%G5701><s%>.

Let <S%G863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> alone <S%G863><s%> <S%G5628><s%>: they be <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> leaders <S%G3595><s%> of the blind <S%G5185><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> lead <S%G3594><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%>, both <S%G297><s%> shall fall <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5699><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ditch <S%G999><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> yet <S%G188><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%>?

Do <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3768><s%> ye <S%G3539><s%> yet <S%G3768><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> entereth in <S%G1531><s%> <S%G5740><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> goeth <S%G5562><s%> <S%G5719><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the belly <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is cast out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5743><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the draught <S%G856><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> those things which <S%G3588><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5740><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> come forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5736><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%>; and they <S%G2548><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> proceed <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5736><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%>, murders <S%G5408><s%>, adulteries <S%G3430><s%>, fornications <S%G4202><s%>, thefts <S%G2829><s%>, false witness <S%G5577><s%>, blasphemies <S%G988><s%>:

These <S%G5023><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the things which <S%G3588><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5629><s%> with unwashen <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>.

Then <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%>, and departed <S%G402><s%> <S%G5656><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3313><s%> of TZor <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> TZidon <S%G4605><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, a woman <S%G1135><s%> of Kanahan <S%G5478><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> coasts <S%G3725><s%>, and cried <S%G2905><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Have mercy <S%G1653><s%> <S%G5657><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>, O YY <S%G2962><s%>, thou Son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>; my <S%G3450><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> is grievously <S%G2560><s%> vexed with a devil <S%G1139><s%> <S%G5736><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the children's <S%G5043><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5629><s%> it to dogs <S%G2952><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%>, great <S%G3173><s%> is thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: be it <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5676><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> departed <S%G3327><s%> <S%G5631><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> nigh unto <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of the Galil <S%G1056><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%>, and sat down <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5711><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Whence <S%G4159><s%> should we <S%G2254><s%> have so much <S%G5118><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2047><s%>, as <S%G5620><s%> to fill <S%G5526><s%> <S%G5658><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, How many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> have ye <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Seven <S%G2033><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> little fishes <S%G2485><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2753><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G377><s%> <S%G5629><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%>.
